ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] 49 songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Khelan, I have camped Guardian Shardwurms in GD and seen the Broodmother.  I have not seen Crystaline Shardwurms or the Matriarch.  Are we talking the same
ygData.messageBody:
Khelan,

I have camped Guardian Shardwurms in GD and seen the Broodmother. I have
not seen Crystaline Shardwurms or the Matriarch. Are we talking the same
wurms or are the ones you speak of farther in the wurm cave? The spot I
camped is: head in cave, take first left and guardians/broodmother are in a
cave on the left. Please let me know.

Thanks,

Piemur

-----Original Message-----
From: Khelan [mailto:khelan@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 16, 2001 3:35 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] 49 songs


Only know of Song of Shield...it sells in the Library in Erudin and a couple
other places.

BTW, for those hunting Melody of Ervaj (or something), our level 50 Velious
spell, it drops off of crystaline shardwurms in Great Divide (seen two drop
in about 18 spell drops there). The spells come fast...we got 10 in about 6
hours one night. This is the cavern with 4 crystaline shardwurms, and the
matriarch spawn.

For those that want to know, this is a list of spells I've seen drop: Melody
of Ervaj, Impr. IVU (6 of these....grrrr), GD portal, Spirit Quickening,
Monster Summoning 2, Shroud of Pain, Impr. Invis, Flame of Light, Superior
Camo.

--Khelan, freezing in Velious.
-Tarew Marr

>>> Matt DeBarger<mattdeba@...> 01/16/01 02:27PM >>>
Where are the 49 songs located? I can find either one...

with the subject submissions.
